title: F.Developers
author: F.Developers
content: Here is my senario, i buy and sell Bitcoin in large qualtities using an Arbitrage method. Here it means am taking advantage of a currency difference between 2 countries and am currently making up to 5% profit per round. If we do this up to 20 times a day, it means we would be doubling our capital daily. Most checkouts dont accept Virtual cards, so this mostly work on my Paypal, if your paypal can receive funds same day and you sell to BTC same day, then this is possible. My paypal dont withdraw as this can only send, i am looking for someone who is interested in this and we can begin to do this together.This is 100% Legal and safe. I would be the one adding the capital so you might not even have to face any risk. Send me a PM if you are interested, Regards.
